text: Alfred Püls (12 August 1933 - 10 August 2020) was an Austrian ice hockey player. He competed in the men's tournaments at the 1956 Winter Olympics and the 1964 Winter Olympics. He was born in Innsbruck, Austria. Püls died on 10 August 2020 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Austrian ice hockey players Category:Olympians for Austria Category:Sportspeople from Innsbruck
title: Alfred Püls
